title: Why Didn’t You Tell Me Your Mother Was a Fujoshi? - Novel Updates
author: 齐楚
description:
Shou: Why didn’t you tell me your mother was a fujoshi?!

Gong: Be good, I also just know.

Shou: Stop groping around, if your mother see us……【Shy】

Gong: It’s okay, if she sees us, so what? Be good, open your mouth.

Shou: Don’t——Um……
……
[Fujoshi mama: Such a black-bellied and rascal of a son was really given birth by me?”>
